metadata.title: The Spatial and Temporal Diffusion of Agricultural Land Prices
metadata.license: © 2019 by the Board of Regents of the University of Wisconsin System

data_sources.source_name: Committee of Evaluation Experts in Lower Saxony (Oberer Gutachterausschuss für Grundstückswerte in Niedersachsen)
data_sources.description: The dataset consists of records of individual land sale transactions for arable land in Lower Saxony, Germany, from January 1985 to December 2015. It includes the price of each sold lot, soil quality as a yield index, and the size of the lot in square meters. This data was used to build a balanced panel of quarterly average county prices, adjusted for soil quality and plot size using a hedonic regression model.
data_sources.access_conditions: Data provided by the committee of evaluation experts in Lower Saxony

assessment.findability_reason: The data is mentioned in the publication but specific access details are limited.
assessment.accessibility_reason: Data is restricted and provided by a specific committee, requiring permission for access.
assessment.interoperability_reason: Data format is specific to transaction records and may require processing for integration with other datasets.
assessment.reusability_reason: Data is detailed and specific to farmland transactions, making it useful for similar studies but limited by access restrictions.
